history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02075
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RATIONALIZING THE ECONOMIC REGULATION OF WATER UTILITIES, CREATING THE WATER REGULATORY COMMISSION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : RAMIREZ-SATO, JOSEPHINE
DATE FILED : 2016-07-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-17
          -TWG created for all bills proposing to create a central body for the water sector, to be chaired by Rep. Herrera-Dy
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-07
          -1st TWG meeting, secretariat instructed to request the Com on Rules to jointly refer water bills to the Coms on Public Works and Highways and Govt Reorg (as primary com)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2017-02-08
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS on 2016-08-08;
